operations.operational_notes: Unit remained in United Kingdom during entire quarter undergoing final training. First elements departed UK on December 24, 1942, and arrived in Algiers on January 3, 1943 (1943-Q1).

combat_units.notes: SEED FILE ERROR: 46th Infantry Division did not arrive in North Africa until 1943-Q1. First elements departed UK December 24, 1942 and arrived Algiers January 3, 1943.

deployment_timeline.notes: Multiple primary sources confirm unit was stationed in UK throughout October-December 1942. Deployment to North Africa began December 24, 1942 with arrival in Algeria on January 3, 1943. The 1942-Q4 entry in north_africa_seed_units_COMPLETE.json should be removed. Actual North Africa service begins 1943-Q1 (already in seed file).

validation.notes: SEED FILE ERROR: Unit was not deployed to North Africa during 1942-Q4. Timeline documentation confirms UK location throughout this quarter with deployment beginning December 24, 1942 (arrival January 3, 1943 in 1943-Q1). This seed file entry should be removed as erroneous.
